article_title: Threatened bats halt some timber projects

article_metadata.author: Kiera Blessing kblessing@eagletribune.com

og.description: This summer, lumber harvesters and landowners in the Northeast who want to sell their timber have new neighbors to worry about — and they're hiding in the trees.
og.title: Threatened bats halt some timber projects
